channel.title: TAU on A Tester's Adventure
channel.description: Recent content in TAU on A Tester's Adventure

item.description: Resources on Test Automation University It is difficult to learn a new technology when you don’t know the prerequisites. You know the destination but you don’t know the way. People from Test Automation University suggest the learning path for multiple topics. You can also find the related courses, provided by important names in testing field. Of course, a few hours course won’t make you a master and you will have to dig a little deeper.
